content.raw:
Thanks. I tried updating to the latest default (97d82a7) and got an earlier error:

***** Internal Program Error - assertion (diffTime.sec < 1) failed in void gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::SensorContainer::RunLoop():
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo6-debbuilder/build/gazebo-6.5.1/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc(507): Took over 1.0 seconds to update a sensor.

I verified that the Load events for the plugins are executing but it never gets to the Update function.
content.html:
Thanks. I tried updating to the latest default (97d82a7) and got an earlier error:

* Internal Program Error - assertion (diffTime.sec < 1) failed in void gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::SensorContainer::RunLoop(): /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo6-debbuilder/build/gazebo-6.5.1/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc(507): Took over 1.0 seconds to update a sensor.

I verified that the Load events for the plugins are executing but it never gets to the Update function.
